XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for CorrectWriting question type

TABLE.NAME: qtype_correctwriting
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains main options for CorrectWriting question

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifier, for connection for original moodle table to this table structure

FIELD.NAME: langid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key, references the formal langs block table of languages

FIELD.NAME: absenterrorweight
FIELD.COMMENT: Penalty for each lexeme, that doesn't contains in student response

FIELD.NAME: addederrorweight
FIELD.COMMENT: Penalty, for each added lexeme to student response

FIELD.NAME: movederrorweight
FIELD.COMMENT: A penalty for error, that consists of moving lexeme in student response.

FIELD.NAME: lexicalerrorthreshold
FIELD.COMMENT: Lexical error threshold for computing Damerau-Levenstein distance

KEY.NAME: questionid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key, referencing the question table

TABLE.NAME: qtype_correctwriting_symbol
TABLE.COMMENT: An information about symbols, that emerge from lexical and syntax analysis

FIELD.NAME: answerid
FIELD.COMMENT: Answer index that symbol belongs to

FIELD.NAME: symbolnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: A unique identifier of symbol, that emerges from lexical analyzing

KEY.NAME: answerid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to answer table
